pkgmetadata.longdescription: The bsdtar program creates and manipulates streaming archive files. It has a number of advantages over previous tar implementations.

use.flag: Build bsdtar and bsdcpio as static archives, removing dependencies over the enabled compression libraries (lzmadec, libbz2, zlib).
Allow accessing bzip2-compressed archives through libbz2 (which comes with bzip2).
Allow accessing lzma-compressed archives through the lzmadec library.
